text: == Classification == {| align=center style="font-size: 90%; border- collapse:collapse" border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 |- align=center bgcolor=#98A1B2 !width=40| !width=220|Season ranking 1958 !width=55|Pt !width=40|G !width=40|W !width=40|D !width=40|L !width=40|PF !width=40|PA |- align=center style="background:#DDEEFF" | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| OKK Beograd ||32||18||16||0||2||1512||1235 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Olimpija ||26||18||12||2||4||1423||1254 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||22 (-1)||18||11||1||6||1278||1148 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text-align:left;"| Zadar ||20||18||9||2||7||1429||1423 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Ljubljana ||20||18||10||0||8||1240||1274 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text- align:left;"| Partizan ||17||18||8||1||9||1241||1280 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||14||18||6||2||10||1146||1265 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text-align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||12||18||6||0||12||1144||1227 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Radnički Belgrade ||8||18||4||0||14||1055||1256 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Jugomontaža ||7 (-1)||18||3||2||13||994||1100 |} The winning roster of OKK Beograd: * Ljubomir Lucić * Miodrag Nikolić * Slobodan Gordić * Radivoj Korać * Slobodan Nešić * Miodrag Popović * Đorđe Otašević * Bogomir Rajković * Vojislav Jovanović * Milorad Erkić * Marko Marković Coach: Borislav Stanković ==Scoring leaders== # Radivoj Korać (OKK Beograd) – ___ points (35.2 ppg) # ??? # ??? == Qualification in 1958-59 season European competitions == FIBA European Champions Cup * OKK Beograd (Champions) ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
title: 1958 Yugoslav First Basketball League
